txt.en: Boromir, son of Gondor, never came back to the land that he loved. He knew the dangers of Mordor, and the evils that dwelt within. So too did he know this truth: one cannot simply walk into that land...\n\n<rgb=#00FF00>...without talking to Boromir one more time for testing purposes, that is.</rgb>
The memory of Boromir travels with those who fight for the same cause that he did. Speak with him on the Slag Hill during the Battle of the Morannon, for testing purposes only.

'No more speaking of hiding and destroying! Now the time has come to enter Mordor, evil land though it be!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Completing this quest will set a number of things under-the-hood for the purpose of knocking down the Black Gate!</rgb>
The Black Land of Mordor waits before you, but the gate is shut.
Talk to Boromir during the Battle of the Morannon
